ref: 9754 *matthara ʻ defective ʼ. 2. *madda -- . 3. *maddha -- . 4. manthara -- (f. ˚rīˊ -- Pāṇ.gaṇa) ʻ slow, lazy, dull, bent, hunchbacked ʼ lex., ˚raka -- m. ʻ name of a hunchback ʼ Pañcat. 5. manda -- ʻ dull -- witted ʼ KaṭhUp., ʻ slow, idle, weak ʼ MBh., ʻ bad ʼ MārkP., ˚aka -- ʻ simple, stupid ʼ. 6. mandara -- ʻ slow, tardy, large, thick ʼ lex. [A ʻ defective ʼ word -- group poss. developed, with variations similar to those of other such groups, from manda<-> (√mand2): but cf. also mindāˊ -- f. ʻ bodily defect ʼ TS. <-> See *mandhyara -- and list s.v. *maṭṭa -- ]
N. matthar ʻ slow, dim, dull ʼ.
